item.description:
Here is a workshop that is very interactive and you will learn a lot about symbolism and how to interpret your own dreams. You can even bring a dream with you for interpretation.

Don't miss this!

Dream Interpretation:
What is your soul trying to tell you through your dreams? Understand the symbolism in your dreams so you can begin to unravel the mystery in their meaning. Father Peter Bowes an expert in Jungian dream interpretation, will help you discover the hidden wisdom of your dreams. Bring a dream to share and unlock the great secret from learning from within.

Cost: $25

if you are from meet up it is $15

See you there...

IN Light,
Rev Gabrielle
item.name: Dream Interpretation
